actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XX of the Social Security Act to provide that no State shall be required to administer individual means tests for the provision of social services defined as group service under the State social service plan.

summary.text: Amends Title XX (Grants to States for Services) of the Social Security Act to provide that no State shall be required to administer individual means tests for the provision of social services defined as group services by a State under its social service plan.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XX of the Social Security Act to provide that no State shall be required to administer individual means tests for the provision of social services defined as group service under the State social service plan.
